chat_Messages.proceed_To_Auth:
Hi, i'm *Jarvis*, Your personal Spotify music bot. 

It seems you are not signed in to your *Spotify* account. Please log in to your account. 

*You can disconnect your account at any time using the /logout command.*
chat_Messages.get_Astray: If you suddenly get astray, you can use the */menu* command to return to the main menu.
chat_Messages.welcome_Message:
Welcome aboard, *{user_Nickname}!* 

Your *Spotify* account is successfully connected!
chat_Messages.where_Put_Songs: What do you want to do with the songs?
chat_Messages.playlist_Being_Prepared: Your playlist is being prepared, please wait.
chat_Messages.playlist_Ready: Your playlist is ready, you can find the playlist by the name *{playlist_Name}*.
